[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Worry-Free-Lawncare-Minneapolis-About-Us-Banner.jpg” background_position=”center_right” background_blend=”multiply” width=”100%” bottom_divider_style=”arrow2″ locked=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”About Us” text_orientation=”center” header_fullscreen=”on” header_scroll_down=”on” scroll_down_icon=”%%2%%” scroll_down_icon_color=”#c2db0c” scroll_down_icon_size=”41px” button_one_text=”CALL NOW!” button_one_url=”tel:6127296610″ _builder_version=”4.7.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|800|||||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#c2db0c” title_font_size=”74px” content_font=”Merriweather Sans|300|||||||” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#ededed” content_font_size=”20px” subhead_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_font_size=”47px” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” custom_button_one=”on” button_one_text_size=”26px” button_one_border_radius=”12px” button_one_custom_margin=”20px|auto|0px|auto|false|true” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”5%||5%||true|false” link_option_url_new_window=”on” hover_enabled=”0″ custom_css_title=”margin-bottom:10px” custom_css_subtitle=”margin-bottom:20px” custom_css_button_1=”text-align:center;||margin:0 auto;” title_text_shadow_style=”preset4″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0.03em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0.05em” content_text_shadow_style=”preset4″ subhead_text_shadow_style=”preset4″ button_one_bg_color__hover=”#c2db0c” button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” title_level=”h2″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Feel free to give us a call if you want more information about any of our services

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/worry-free-leaf-bg4.png” background_size=”initial” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”70%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||22px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text module_class=”titleGreen” _builder_version=”4.7.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_font_size=”50px” custom_margin=”||28px|||” header_2_text_align_tablet=”center” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size_phone=”40px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Why Choose Worry Free Lawn Care?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”67%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”1px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” text_orientation=”center”]

When you work with Worry Free Lawn Care, the primary focus is to create the most skillfully designed lawn, shaping it into something you will love and be proud to show off to friends and family.

Owned and operated by Chris & Shane Blazina for over 25 years, every member of our lawn care and snow removal team is passionate about what they do. Working closely with you from concept to completion, they use your ideas to design a beautiful, efficient property tailored to your every need, then help you bring it to life and provide the necessary care and maintenance to leave it looking like new for years to come.

You have plenty of things in your life to worry about, but you shouldn’t have to worry about your lawn as well. That’s why we built this business from the ground up. We want to take care of your lawn so that you don’t have to. We provide a huge variety of lawn care services that will make your lawn set the neighborhood standard without you needing to lift a finger.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Experience” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%430%%” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#c2db0c” use_circle_border=”on” icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”105px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_text_color=”#034333″ body_font=”Merriweather Sans|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#666666″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”2em” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”center” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” body_text_align_tablet=”” body_text_align_phone=”center” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone”]

We have 20 years of experience as a lawn care company that we will put to work for you, and we only hire lawn care experts that have the experience necessary to make sure that your lawn is healthy and that you are happy. More than just mowing the lawn, all of our lawn service professionals know the ins-and-outs of Minneapolis lawn care and know what it takes to make sure that your grass looks great.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Equipment” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%581%%” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#c2db0c” use_circle_border=”on” icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”105px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_text_color=”#034333″ body_font=”Merriweather Sans|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#666666″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”2em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”center” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” body_text_align_tablet=”” body_text_align_phone=”center” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Combined with experience, our lawn care experts are armed with the best equipment available, which means that they can get the job done better and faster. We strive to be up-to-date on the latest lawn care equipment available to make sure that we are doing the best possible job on your lawn. That means straighter lines, better cleanups, and more luscious lawns.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Dependability” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%162%%” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#c2db0c” use_circle_border=”on” icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”105px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_text_color=”#034333″ body_font=”Merriweather Sans|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#666666″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”2em” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”center” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” body_text_align_tablet=”” body_text_align_phone=”center” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone”]

No matter what your lawn care needs are, you can depend on us to meet them for you. Not only do our many services cover all of your needs from spring dethatching and summer trimmings to fall cleanups and winter snow removals, but we will also be there right when you need us. If you’re having a garden party, let us know so we can come and get your lawn ready to receive company.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Affordability” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%460%%” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#c2db0c” use_circle_border=”on” icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”105px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_text_color=”#034333″ body_font=”Merriweather Sans|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#666666″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”2em” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”center” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” body_text_align_tablet=”” body_text_align_phone=”center” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone”]

We understand that saving money is important to you, which is why all of our lawn care services are competitively priced, so you don’t have to worry about how much you’re spending on our services. When you factor in the time and money that you will save by letting us worry about your lawn care, it’s easy to see why so many other people have already chosen Worry Free Lawn Care.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Flexibility” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%371%%” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#c2db0c” use_circle_border=”on” icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”105px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_text_color=”#034333″ body_font=”Merriweather Sans|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#666666″ body_font_size=”15px” body_line_height=”2em” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”center” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” body_text_align_tablet=”” body_text_align_phone=”center” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone”]

All of our plans are customized and made to fit into your specific needs and budget. All of our additional services such as edging and aerating are completely optional, and you can choose to have us come out on a weekly or a biweekly basis to take care of your property. If you ever want any additional services done, please feel free to give us a call and let us know what we can do for you.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_text_color=”#034333″ header_2_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#034333″ header_3_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#034333″ header_4_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_4_text_color=”#034333″ header_5_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_5_text_color=”#034333″ header_6_font=”Raleway|600||on|||||” header_6_text_color=”#034333″ custom_margin=”||6px|||”]

We proudly serve the following Twin Cities communities

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default”]

  • Arden Hills
  • Bloomington
  • Burnsville
  • Columbia Heights
  • Eagan
  • Falcon Heights
  • Hilltop
  • Inver Grove Heights
  • Lauderdale
  • Lilydale
  • Little Canada
  • Maplewood
  • Mendota Heights
  • Minneapolis
  • Mounds View
  • New Brighton
  • North St. Paul
  • Richfield
  • Roseville
  • Shoreview
  • St. Anthony
  • St. Paul
  • West St. Paul. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#063ab0″ background_image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/worry-free-leaf-bg3.png” background_size=”initial” background_position=”bottom_left” background_repeat=”repeat-x” background_blend=”exclusion” vertical_offset=”0px” top_divider_style=”waves” top_divider_height=”25px” top_divider_repeat=”0x” top_divider_arrangement=”above_content” bottom_divider_height=”32px” bottom_divider_repeat=”0x” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|800|||||||” text_text_color=”#c2db0c” text_font_size=”40px” text_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_2_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#c2db0c” header_2_font_size=”50px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” text_text_shadow_style=”preset1″]

CALL WORRY FREE LAWN CARE TODAY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”24px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”||41px|||”]

We can also take care of light tree trimming, hedge trimming, and more.
free estimate on how we can prepare your yard – whether it’s your home or business.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”tel:6127296610″ url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Call (612) 729-6610 ” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”25px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_border_radius=”15px” button_font=”Merriweather Sans|600||on|||||” background_layout=”dark” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#c2db0c” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#161616″ custom_padding=”||34px|||” global_module=”381″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_2,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center”]

Lawn Mowing / Lawn Care – Commercial Lawn Services – Lawn Maintenance – Yard Trimming and Blowing – Spring and Fall Cleanup – Dethatching – Yard Aerating – Hedge Trimming – Mulching / Garden Maintenance / Planting – Snow Removal

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/worryfreelogo.png” title_text=”worryfreelogo” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center”]

We proudly serve the following communities:
Minneapolis, St Paul, Bloomington, Columbia Heights, Inver Grove Heights, Maplewood, Mendota Heights, New Brighton, ​and Richfield

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
